text: The Maspalomas Dunes are sand dunes located on the south coast of the island of Gran Canaria, Province of Las Palmas in the Canary Islands. A 404 hectare area of the municipality of San Bartolom√© de Tirajana, they have been protected as a nature reserve.Reserva Natural Especial de Las Dunas de Maspalomas (C-7) Red Canaria de Espacios Naturales Protegidos. They are one of 100 finalists for the 12 Treasures of Spain in 2007. ==References== Category:12 Treasures of Spain - Finalists Category:Province of Las Palmas
title: Maspalomas Dunes
